name: The Torture Room
description:
You are standing in a middle of a square room.  Along the walls skeletons 
are hanging in rusty chains.  In the middle of the room there is a big metal 
box, covered with dust.  To the south you can just make out a small exit.

exits.description: It is too dark to tell.
exits.keywords: door iron~ 1 -1 7286 E skeletons~ When you look at the skeletons, you can see that they once had been in great  pain.  They are hanging in their arms, and some of them were killed with a sharp instrument.
